features: EXPERIENCE THE POWER OF 2X STICKINESS: Post-it Super Sticky Notes offer twice the sticking power of basic sticky notes, ensuring they stay put and won't fall off
STICK AND RESTICK ANYWHERE: These notes adhere firmly to walls, windows, doors, and other vertical surfaces, allowing you to move your reminders with ease
GET ORGANIZED: Each pack includes 3 pads of 3 in. x 3 in. notes, with 45 sheets per pad, great for your office, work area, or classroom

VERSATILE AND ESSENTIAL: Post-it Super Sticky Notes are the perfect solution for shopping lists, reminders, to-do lists, color-coding, labeling, family chore reminders, brainstorming, storyboarding, and quick notes
VARIOUS SIZES AND SHAPES: Available in different sizes, with or without lines, to cater to your specific needs
EYE-CATCHING COLORS: Vibrant and colorful reminders are more likely to grab attention and be noticed
INTRODUCING THE ENERGY BOOST COLLECTION: Uplift your spirits and messages via the vibrant, strong colors of Vital Orange, Tropical Pink, and Limeade from the Energy Boost collection
EXPLORE OUR COLLECTIONS: With 11 color collections, the Post-it Brand offers a wide range of options to suit every style and preference, whether at home, in school, or at the office
TRUST THE ORIGNAL CREATOR: Made in the USA with globally sourced materials, the one and only Post-it Note was invented over 40 years ago by the Post-it Brand
SUSTAINABILITY: Post-it Super Sticky Notes can be recycled
body.description: Product Description Uplift your spirits and messages via the vibrant, strong colors of the Energy Boost collection. Whether jotting down your daily to-do's, brainstorming big ideas, studying or setting reminders, colors and ideas are always brighter together. These sticky notes feature 2X the sticking power. They also stick and re-stick - allowing you to move your notes with you throughout your day. They’re ideal for walls, doors, windows and other vertical surfaces, and like all Post-it Notes, they stick securely yet remove cleanly without damage. Keep your ideas across your notebooks, classroom books, calendars or other documents. No tape or tacks are needed with adhesive notes, saving you money and time on office products or school supplies. A great memo pad, these are ideal for using for notes or reminders to yourself or others. Post-it Super Sticky Notes are the perfect solution for shopping lists, reminders, notes on computer screens, time tracking, to-do lists, marking cables, color-coding documents, reminding kids to do chores, storyboarding, scratch paper and agile processing. Each notes sheet is approximately 3 in. x 3 in., with 45 sheets per pad and 3 sticky note pads per pack. These colorful sticky notes include colors from the Energy Boost collection including orange, pink and green. All Post-it Notes are sourced from certified, renewable and responsibly managed forests, and all Post-it Notes are recyclable, so you can recycle them when they are no longer needed. From the Manufacturer Post-it Super Sticky Notes hold stronger and longer than most self-adhesive notes so you can be sure that your message gets through. Have the confidence to leave important messages on multiple surfaces including computer monitors, office doors, and walls. Notes stick to almost any surface and don"t fall off. Notes are also part of the Jewel Pop Collection and the perfect size for notes and reminders. Paper comes from well-managed forests where trees are replanted. Each pad includes 45 sheets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sticky and brightly colored
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to leave encouraging notes for people everywhere I go. Ink doesn't bleed through and they stick pretty well to a variety of surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Post it notes
reviews.reviewText: Great value for your money . I use them for my shopping lists!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stays sticky even when moved around
reviews.reviewText: I moved these from my kitchen counter to my bag to my bathroom and back to the kitchen again and they stayed sticky for a while! Great for self worth reminders. My 'I am good enough' sticky note help up. Also helpful for little to-do lists when I'm not around my happy planner, creating reminders, or shopping lists to bring in my bag. I prefer written lists to notes on apps. Even virtual sticky notes aren't as good as the real thing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Post its are always great quality
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as they've always been, they work well and make notes simple due to their adhesive backing. My only issue is the price of everything, "these days."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the trick
reviews.reviewText: Not a great value, but acceptable. Size is great, large enough. I wish the orange was more orange and less Creamsicle. Overall fine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works better than regular sticky notes
reviews.reviewText: I use the sticky strips to cover over information when I am scanning the document. Regular sticky notes last about a 1-1.5 days. These last 3-4 days.
Fun colours and they last well stuck to my monitors for those important reminders!
